content.description: Start on the side of the Hammer Head on small crimps, move left to a sloper that allows a transition onto the face of the boulder, make a difficult crimp on the left and move up the square feature to an easy topout.
content.location: One valley West of the Mushroom boulder, under a giant wheel shaped boulder.

content.description:
This is boulder is located in a gully near the Mushroom Boulder (just West of it). It is nestled at the bottom of the valley/wash gully near a project highball. 

  The boulder is easy and fun which is hard to come by in the canyon. It is really worth going to if you are in a group that is headed to the Mushroom boulder. The rock quality is very gritty and the climb has pockets, crimps and slopers that are of very good quality.
